string.value: You have now reached Level 29, which means it's time for you to ambush the #o9300344#, no? You should head over to #b#m104000000##k and notify #b#p1002104##k that you are ready for action.

#p1002104#, seeing that you're determined to attack the #o9300344#, decides to rent a powerful weapon for you. It's a disposable weapon, but it'll be put to good use. Now everything is set for the ambush in #b#m910510201##k. Remember, the password is 'Francis is a genius Puppeteer!'

#o9300344##r #a217311##k
The Black Wings' Clue #t4032322# #b#c4032322# / 1#k

You defeated the Puppeteer, but he ran away before you could finish him off. All you have left is a document the Puppeteer dropped while running away. When you showed #p1002104# the document, he suddenly looked dead serious.
Okay, we know the location of his headquarters and we know the password. All we need to do now is to attack the #r#o9300344##k. Are you ready, Aran?

I figured, attacking the #o9300344# would require a powerful weapon, so I rented one from someone I know. It's a disposable weapon that will disappear the moment you log off, but it's very useful. I suggest you use it when attacking the #o9300344#.
Now head over to #b#m910510201##k and eliminate the #o9300344# once and for all! Oh, and if you find any #bclues regarding the Black Wings#k, bring it back to me, okay? Good luck!
You're not ready yet? No need to be nervous. You're a hero, remember? You'll do fine.

Did you manage to defeat the #o9300344#? Yes! I knew you'd be able to do it! You're amazing, seriously! \n#b#L0#(You tell him about your conversation with the #o9300344# and the fact that the #o9300344# escaped.)#l\n#k

Really? So the #o9300344# escaped? Well… in that case, then he'll probably rear his ugly head sooner or later, so we'll just have to wait and see. More importantly though, the conversation bothers me a bit. Hmmm? What is that? Something that the #o9300344# dropped? Wait... this is the #bPuppeteer's Document#k...? Show me, show me! I need to see what's on it.
It's written in code, but this is a major find! This will let us know of the future plans of the Black Wings! And the thing is… I know an expert codebreaker who can figure this out in no time.

You haven't eliminated #r#o9300344##k yet? Please make sure to defeat him and bring back some #bclues about the Black Wings#k, okay? You know where he is, right? Enter the password at the #b#m105070300##k and it'll lead you straight to #m910510201#!

You haven't eliminated #r#o9300344##k yet? Please make sure to defeat him and bring back some #bclues about the Black Wings#k, okay? You know where he is, right? Enter the password at the #b#m105070300##k and it'll lead you straight to #m910510201#!
